extendedInfo.description: Take a salary cap of $40 and pick 12 baseball players you think will earn the most fantasy points.  Top winners earn in-game coins which can be redeemed to win real prizes such as Netflix and Amazon gift cards. Create your own MLB team and play against others in leagues of 14 in a daily & weekly contest. Your commissioner management skills will help your Baseball team succeed! Your season starts when you join!  Voted the #1 Arcade-Style Fantasy Baseball Android gameWhether you are a fantasy baseball rookie, or a phenomenon, you can become the next big winner.Draft from all the best MLB players anytime on a salary cap, add and remove players from your lineup and bench at will, you don't need to waiver or propose a trade.   Just draft your team and watch your points add up! The perfect add-on to your season-long ESPN, Yahoo, or CBS fantasy baseball league.   You can draft a new team every day on a salary cap in daily and weekly contests all year.  A new breakout game by DraftKings.com the leaders in Fantasy Sports gameplay, featured on TechCrunch, RotoWire and more.  Play it today.  - Features - â Edit your entire lineup anytime â You are the manager of your own salary cap teamâ Trophy case! â No time to draft?
